Copier Business Generating Quote: s for Refurbished Copy Machines
Melville, NY – August 29, 2015 – Buying a copier is a big decision. Copiers are expensive and the process of choosing the right copier is time consuming. Most companies want to purchase a copier that they can use for many years. In addition to weighing different brands and models, you must also decide whether you would like to purchase or lease a new copier or purchase a refurbished, remanufactured, or used copier. Long Island Copiers has noticed a trend in more companies investing in refurbished copier machines recently.
Long Island Copiers knows that making a few small changes in the way you conduct your everyday business can make a huge impact and help you to save money. When upgrading your copier, there are many factors to consider. A refurbished copier may be just what your company needs. Refurbished copiers are typically sold 50-75 percent below MSRP. That means on a $50,000 copier you could potentially save from $25,000 - $35,000 on a slightly used copier that is capable of all the same functions. Because you can buy a refurbished copy machine at such discounted prices, you or your company will be able to afford a much better, top name brand copier than you might be able to buy otherwise.
Refurbished equipment from a reliable dealer will be in “like new” condition. Some start up organizations need a new and larger machine, but do not have the funds right now for a new machine. Some businesses purchase refurbished as a “green” choice which keeps a perfectly good machine from being placed in a landfill before its true end of life. Reliable dealers will also have a warranty on refurbished devices. Long Island Copier’s will be able to assist their clients in purchasing the right copier that will meet all your companies’ demands and expectations. They pride themselves in carrying the best machines to help their clients increase productivity, improve energy efficiency, and maintain cost effectiveness.
Let Long Island Copier’s expertise in the copier business assist you in your decision. They have been an industry leader in the copier business for more than twenty years. They carry a variety of office machines and supplies and provide expert copier repair services on all major brands. Performance and reliability are crucial to their business.
